ISSUE.TITLE: FixedByWeightByTotal plugin. Use 4 decimal precision for entries
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: nopCommerce version: 4.40 As for other entities in the core. Or use the validator to warn a user about the current decimal precision. Source: https://www.nopcommerce.com/boards/topic/90928/fixedbyweightbytotal-plugin-weight-per-rate-unit-rounds-the-value-00543-00500

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Changed type of ScheduleTask.LastEnabledUtc to DateTime2 instead of DateTime

COMMIT.MESSAGE: #5674 Changed decimal precision for entries to 4
